get.summary: Get all courses (Public and Authenticated users)
get.description: Retrieve all courses. If user is logged in, filter by enrolled status or show personalized data.

parameters.name: searchKey
parameters.description: Search by course title (case-insensitive, partial match)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by course status. Allowed values: draft, published, archived.

parameters.name: is_enrolled
parameters.description: Filter by enrollment status: 1 for enrolled, 0 for not enrolled.

parameters.name: is_featured
parameters.description: Filter by is featured: 1 for featured, 0 for not non featured.

parameters.name: category_ids
parameters.description: Filter by one or more category IDs (comma-separated). Example: 1,3,5

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: Filter by course level (e.g., beginner, intermediate, advanced).

parameters.name: price_range
parameters.description: Filter courses by price range. Comma-separated values where the first value is min and the second is max. Example: 100,500  start or end can be empty like ',500' or '100,'.
